titles.title: 584 And Shall I Pray Thee Change Thy Will (word fi

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
And shall I pray
Thee change Thy will my Father
Until it be according unto mine
But no Lord no
That never shall be rather
I pray Thee blend
My human will with Thine

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I pray Thee hush
The hurrying eager longing
I pray Thee soothe
The pangs of keen desire
See in my quiet places
Wishes thronging
Forbid them Lord
Purge though it be with fire

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And work in me
To will and do Thy pleasure
Let all within me
Peaceful reconciled
Tarry content my
Well-Beloved's leisure
At last - At last
Even as a weaned child
